description: Gets a knowledge base category from TRASH.

schema.title: category
schema.description: Name of the knowledge base category.

name.description: Name of the knowledge base category.

scope.description:
Defines the scope of the knowledge base category:
For a MSP tenant, scope is either PARTNER or CLIENT
For a CLIENT tenant, scope is not applicable

clientIds.description: Defines the list of Client IDs. This is mandatory for a MSP tenant with CLIENT scope.

description.description: (Optional) Description of the knowledge base category.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Describes the client ID or msp ID of the tenant

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: Specifies the unique category identifier in the knowledge base
